input.sentences: the start of the sightseeing tour | taking photos of each other from opposite sides of the street .
very clean windows along the covered walkway reflected the street below .
the strange little cottage was a stark difference to the modern architecture around it .
even more strange to see someone tending to a perfect flower garden in the middle of all the concrete and glass .
the local butterfly population seemed to be grateful though !
output.sentences: Site seeing and touring are a main hobby of many people on vaction who love taking pictures.
From the street and walkway, this man has taken a wonderful picture of a window reflecting the world.
Here is another picture he took of a  stark but modern example of architecture.
From a distance, he was able to get a better view of a local man tending the gardens.
This local butterfly is merely grateful that the photographer has left him alone to enjoy a bit of lunch.
